title: PUMA Model not loading properly - gzweb

content.raw:
Hi,
I have model puma560 in gazebo and I could control its joints using a plugin in gzclient but in gzweb. My model does not render properly. I have attached the  screenshot for the model as well both in gzweb and gzclient. I am using aws to render my gzweb. Also I could not control the joints of the model. Is there any solution for that? I want to use simple kinematics to control the joints not the PID.

Thanks much.
content.html:
Hi, I have model puma560 in gazebo and I could control its joints using a plugin in gzclient but in gzweb. My model does not render properly. I have attached the screenshot for the model as well both in gzweb and gzclient. I am using aws to render my gzweb. Also I could not control the joints of the model. Is there any solution for that? I want to use simple kinematics to control the joints not the PID.

Thanks much.
